member.name: M:BuddyOS.Wheels.TurnAbsoluteAngle(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Turns until the desired angle is reached in world space (based Buddy's odometry).
member.param: Desired angle in degrees
Desired wheels speed in degrees per seconds
Tolerance, in degrees, around the final angle where the robot would stop
member.remarks: The absolute target angle defines the robot orientation in world space (relative to the first position when the robot woke up)
The robot's pose in world space at time = 0 is (x = 0, z = 0, theta = 0).

member.summary: Turns with a target angle (in degrees) from the current orientation.
member.param: Desired angle in degrees

Tolerance, in degrees, around the final angle where the robot would stop
member.remarks: The target angle defines the robot orientation in local space (relative to its actual orientation)

member.name: M:BuddyOS.Wheels.MoveToAbsolutePosition(UnityEngine.Vector2,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Makes the robot go to a target position in world space (relative to the first position when the robot woke up).
member.param: x and y coordinate in meters
Desired wheels speed in degrees per seconds
Tolerance, in meters, around the final position where the robot would stop
member.remarks: The absolute target position defines the robot position in world space (relative to the first position when the robot woke up)
The robot's pose in world space at time = 0 is (x = 0, z = 0, theta = 0).

Desired whees speed in degrees per seconds
Tolerance, in meters, around the final position where the robot would stop
member.remarks: The target position defines the robot position in local space (relative to its actual orientation)
The robot's pose in world space at time = 0 is (x = 0, z = 0, theta = 0).
